page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There are no cinemas in this area, the nearest being 30 miles away at Durham or 23 miles away at Hexham. There are often film shows given by local photo- graphers in private houses or local halls to raise funds for local activ- ities or for charities. There are live theatrical performances at West- gate and Stanhope once or twice a year. Some people in the area belong to a Theatre Club based at Stanhope and buses from there take members to theatres in Newcastle, Sunderland, Billingham and Darlington. A Music Festival is held each June in St. John's Chapel and several people from the area help in its organisation and some perform in it. Concerts are held at High House and Wearhead Methodist Churches.
